item.title:
The bet:
Christoph Koch is the neuroscientist & David Chalmers is the philosopher.
The winner gets 2 bottles of (really fine) wine.
Through an "adversarial collaboration", experiments that should decide between theories were performed.

item.title:
Dan Dennett joins via Zoom, noticing that no clear definition of consciousness was given in the terms of the bet.
He says the hard question is "And then what happens?" meaning consciousness is only meaningful/defined by what it leads to but the definition is necessarily blurry
